RelatedSentence: This fall Southwest Airlines is adding Dallas and Punta Cana to the list of cities it serves nonstop from Baltimore .
This fall Southwest Airlines is adding Dallas and Punta Cana to the list of cities it serves nonstop from Baltimore .
13 , travelers can fly from BWI - Marshall Airport to Dallas Love Field , where the airline got its start more than 40 years ago .
The airline also announced Monday that it will add two cities - Punta Cana and Mexico City - to its roster of international destinations , part of Southwest 's continued integration of AirTran .
